EmailTemplate.description: Push email sent + 50 days to Brand company to remind him to take a picture of the bottles in the cellar
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Remind Market Company to take a picture bottle 50
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Photo step 2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Brand Company ,
50 days have passed since the {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name}; please send by email & by post a second picture of the bottles ageing in the cellar.
Thank you for your help,
By&For Team
